_instructions: Define your brand voice and communication style. This helps Claude write content that sounds authentically like your business.

personality.tone: Warm, welcoming, and knowledgeable - like a trusted neighbor who happens to be an expert
personality.humor: Light and appropriate - occasional warmth but not forced

communication.style: Direct, clear, and genuine - no fluff or overselling
communication.preferredPronouns: Mission Lawn Care, the team, our crew
communication.sentenceStructure: Clear and concise - easy to understand, action-oriented

coreBeliefs: Hard work and discipline lead to quality results
Supporting our community makes us stronger
principles: Show up on time, every time
Do what you say you'll do
Treat every property like our own
Be transparent about pricing and services

storytelling.narrativeApproach: Customer-focused - highlight how Mission Lawn Care makes their lives easier and their properties more beautiful
commonThemes: Work-life balance (we handle the lawn, you enjoy your time)
storytelling.emotionalTone: Trustworthy and reassuring - customers feel confident their property is in good hands

audienceConnection.howWeAddress: Customers as valued neighbors and community members
audienceConnection.relationshipStyle: Professional yet personal - Mission Lawn Care knows your name and your property
callsToAction: Let us take care of your lawn

typicalPhrases: Mission Lawn Care is proud to serve the Anderson community.
Your lawn is in good hands with Mission Lawn Care.
Let Mission Lawn Care handle the hard work.
sampleMessages: Mission Lawn Care brings veteran discipline and neighborly service to every property in Anderson, SC. From regular lawn maintenance to complete landscaping transformations, your property will look its best.
Ready to enjoy your weekends again? Mission Lawn Care takes the work out of lawn care so you can spend time on what matters most.
doSay: We appreciate your trust in Mission Lawn Care
Quality service you can depend on
Proud to serve our Anderson neighbors
dontSay: You won't find a better deal
